net.asrex.skillful.skill

Class Skill

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.skill.Skill

  • public class Skill
extends java.lang.Object
    A Skill is some named measure of progress in some area. Skills have levels that increment after a certain amount of progress has been made in the skill. These levels can then be used to enable or purchase a Perk.

    Skills may be seeded by various world events. Seeding increments the progress by a certain amount (as specified by whatever causes the seeding event).

    The Skill class itself represents the player-stored data for an associated SkillDefinition. SkillDefinitions are user-configurable objects that control data such as events that seed the skill and the level scaling method.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • addLevels

        public void addLevels(int levels)
        Adds the given number of levels to this skill. Progress within the current level will be reset to zero.
        Parameters:
        levels - the number of levels to add
        See Also:
        #progressForLevel(int)

      • addLevel

        public void addLevel()
        Adds a single level to this skill, reseting progress.
        See Also:
        addLevels(int)

      • getProgressPercent

        public float getProgressPercent()
        Gets the current progress within the level as a floating point number such that 0 <= x <= 1.
        Returns:
        the progress in the level as a float
        See Also:
        #getProgress()

      • addProgress

        public boolean addProgress(int diff)
        Adds the given amount of progress to this skill. If the amount added is enough to cause a rollover, addLevel() will be called.

        Note that for a large enough value of diff, multiple level rollovers may occur.

        Parameters:
        diff - the amount of progress to add
        Returns:
        true if the added progress caused this skill's level to increase, false if not

      • seed

        public boolean seed(java.lang.String event)
        Seeds this skill, causing the progress in the level to increase by the amount defined for the seed event.
        Parameters:
        event - the seed event
        Returns:
        true if the added progress caused this skill's level to increase, false if not

      • readNBT

        public void readNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Deserializes this Skill from NBT. Subclasses should override this method if additional persistent data needs to be stored; however, super.writeNBT() must be called to ensure deserializtion can occur.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to read data from

      • writeNBT

        public void writeNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Serializes this Skill to the given NBT tag. Subclasses should override this method if additional persistent data needs to be stored; however, super.writeNBT() must be called to ensure deserializtion can occur.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to write data into

      • fromNBT

        public static Skill fromNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Deserializes a Perk from the given NBT tag. A Skill instance of the appropriate type will be returned.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to read skill data from
        Returns:
        a Skill instance, or null if no skill could be loaded (with a logged error)
